TypeOfAccessRightAssignment.Name: LowVAT
TypeOfAccessRightAssignment.Description: Price with low VAT as for e.g. public transport, entertainment (public broadcasting, cinemas, amusement parks, sports arrangements) and lodging (currently 6% until 2021-09-30, thereafter 12%)

TypeOfAccessRightAssignment.Name: ReducedVAT
TypeOfAccessRightAssignment.Description: Price with reduced VAT as calculated for 'Næringsmidler' such as food items (currently 15%)

FareZone.Name: Temporary construction for ID tickets (will be moved to SiteFrame once the Nordic NeTEx profile update is approved)

UserProfile.Name: Reduced
UserProfile.ProofRequired: passport birthCertificate drivingLicence identityDocument medicalDocument other

PreassignedFareProduct.Name: Single trip valid within one zone
Single trip valid within two zones

TypeOfTravelDocument.Name: Travelcard
TypeOfTravelDocument.Description: Per Railway Directorate handbook compatible electronic travel card, e.g. Ruter#, Vy

TypeOfTravelDocument.Name: Single use electronic ticet
TypeOfTravelDocument.Description: Ruter# disposable travel card compatible electronic ticket

SalesOfferPackageElement.Name: Single trip valid within one fare zone valid for one hour

SalesOfferPackage.Name: Single trip valid within two zones

SalesOfferPackageElement.Name: Single trip valid within two fare zones valid for one and a halv hours

FareContract.Name: Full price single mobile ticket for travel within one zone

SalesTransaction.Name: Purchase of full price single mobile ticket for travel within one zone
